sentence: "Wouldn't it be fantastic if the legendary Herschel Walker ran for the United States Senate in Georgia?"
author: Aila Slisco
title: God, Not Trump, Inspired Herschel Walker to Run for Office, NFL Star Says

sentence: The browser does not support the specified video codec Herschel Walker, the Georgia Republican Senate nominee and former NFL player, said he's mad at former President Trump for claiming he was the one who lured Walker into the race to unseat Sen. Raphael Warnock (D-Ga.).
author: Max Greenwood
title: Herschel Walker mad' at Trump over remarks about Senate bid

sentence: Megan Varner/Getty Images Herschel Walker said he's "mad" at former President Trump for comments about his Georgia Senate run.
author: John L. Dorman
title: Herschel Walker says he's 'mad' that Trump is 'taking credit' for his decision to run in the Georgia Senate race
